textBox.richText: This project is officially done! I am very happy to have had a chance to work with my awesome team members to make this project a success! As part of the class requirement, we made a website that highlighted milestones in our project. For more in depth information and visual appeal, check out our website at this url. Our team members (clockwise from me): Ben Yee, Jared Porter, Robert Luan, and Stephen Chen Lesson learned: It’s good to stay on the ground. Building swarm robots can get really expensive. Our total cost neared $1000 for 5 robots. Also, building a project with an interactive, audience engaging, demonstration will help secure votes for the $500 grand prize at Demo Day.
